definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: Sophie:Now wash them, then dice the potatoes and bell peppers. Then slice the meat.
sentences.chinese: 現在把他們都洗乾淨，青椒和土豆切成丁兒，肉切片。

sentences.english: Place cucumber, green pepper and onion into a large salad bowl, salt them.
sentences.chinese: 將黃瓜，青椒和洋蔥放在大的色拉碗中，加鹽醃。

sentences.english: I'd like a tomato and green pepper pizza.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一個帶中紅柿和青椒的披薩餅。

sentences.english: Add in black fungus,bell pepper and carrots.
sentences.chinese: 隨放木耳，青椒絲和胡蘿蔔絲大火翻炒。

sentences.english: Feta cheese, marinated grilled mixed bell peppers, sliced olives and lettuce sesoned with oregano.
sentences.chinese: 發達芝士，醃烤青椒，切片橄欖，生菜，香料。

sentences.english: It’s green pepper, cilantro, and cucumbers.
Spicy, scented with distinct minerality. Hints of green pepper.
sentences.chinese: 辣，香氣中帶有明顯的礦物味，一點點青椒。

sentences.english: Soon I was chopsticking shredded pork with green chilies into my mouth, and chasing it with stir-fried white cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 很快我用筷子伴着青椒的碎肉，和幹炒白菜進嘴裏。

sentences.english: Tomato, mozzarella , mushrooms, green peppers, onion and corn.
sentences.chinese: 蕃茄沙司，芝士，蘑菇，青椒，洋蔥，玉米。

sentences.english: A fresh pepper, whether (it is) red or green, lasts about three weeks.
sentences.chinese: 新鮮辣椒，不管紅椒青椒，可以保鮮大約三星期。

sentences.english: Let me have your beef with pepper on your lunch specials and a bowl of wanton soup.
sentences.chinese: 我喫午餐特色菜牛肉炒青椒，再來一碗餛飩湯。

sentences.english: As well as onions and green peppers.
Roasted with marinated seafood, green pepper, onion, mushroom.
sentences.chinese: 海鮮，青椒，洋蔥，鮮蘑烘烤而成。

sentences.english: Since DC and I don't eat spring onion, we used capsicum (green bell pepper) and lettuce instead.
sentences.chinese: 由於DC和我不喫蔥，我們用了青椒和生菜代替。

sentences.english: Green peppers, also known as seven pepper, green brown skin color, the quality is poor.
sentences.chinese: 青椒也稱七花椒，皮色青褐，品質較差。

sentences.english: Found in red and green peppers; and rambutan fruit.
sentences.chinese: 在紅椒和青椒，紅毛丹果裏找到。

definition: eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]
